title: 'Not so Good
body: '2.0 out of 5 stars'17/09/2023 Review after using this cleanser about 1 months  Ya it's does clean hair  Sla & paraben Free  But doesn't remove Dandruff completely  Negative point:- Khadi natural proudly says that this product is totally chemical free but it's hae chemical like in ingredients it clearly mentioned it does contain FRAGRANCE & COLOUR and we all well know they contain chemical  As a user my suggestion to the company is STOP ADDING COLOURS OR FRAGRANCE in it we user don't want any smell or colour & by doing this u can also save few money & final product output will be totally chemical free  Finally verdict:- Dont buy this
